com.java.GameEngine.View

Class Display

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.java.GameEngine.View.Display

  • public class Display
extends java.lang.Object
    Display class is used to present data to user.
    It is used for user / program interaction.
    Author:
    Serkan Demirci

      • getInstance

        public static Display getInstance()
        Returns the instance of the display.
        Returns:
        Single instance of the display object.

      • setSize

        public void setSize(int parWidth,
           int parHeight)
        Sets the size of the display.
        Precondition : parX > 0, parY > 0
        Parameters:
        parWidth - Width of the display.
        parHeight - Height of the display.

        Returns the Canvas of the display.

        Canvas

      • getKeyboardListener

        public KeyboardInputListener getKeyboardListener()
        Returns the keyboard listener.
        Returns:
        An instance of KeyboardInputListener.
        Display records all key events in that listener.

      • getMouseListener

        public MouseInputListener getMouseListener()
        Returns the mouse listener.
        Returns:
        An instance of KeyboardInputListener.
        Display records all mouse events in that listener.

      • isCloseRequested

        public boolean isCloseRequested()
        Checks whether user is request a close.
        Returns:
        Whether user requested to close the display.

        Makes display visible.

        parVisible - Visibility of the display.

        Checks whether display is visible.
